P. 7</ls>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in साधनं सुमहद्यस्य, मुग्धा कुट्मलिताननेन दधती वायुं स्थिता तत्र सा, and मृदुपवनविभिन्नो मत्प्रियाया विनाशात्, the words साधन, वायु and विनाश are अश्लील, and produce respectively a sense of shame, disgust and inauspiciousness, साधन suggesting the sense of लिंग (male organ of generation), वायु, of the अपान wind (that escaping at the anus), and विनाश, of मृत्यु (death); <ab>cf.</ab> the instances under <ls>S.
